vulnerabilities.title: DOM clobbering could escalate to Cross-site Scripting (XSS)
vulnerabilities.description: Pagefind initializes its dynamic JavaScript and WebAssembly files relative to the location of the first script you load. This information is gathered by looking up the value of `document.currentScript.src`. It is possible to "clobber" this lookup with otherwise benign HTML on the page, for example: ```html ``` This will cause `document.currentScript.src` to resolve as an external domain, which will then be used by Pagefind t
